data.name: BeFootball SuperPlayer
data.description:
BeFootball SuperPlayer is part of BeFootballâ€™s immersive metaverse. For the first time, a complete ecosystem designed by professional players and dedicated to soccer arrives to VR. The most realistic physics at the service of the most practiced sport in the world.

In BF SuperPlayer you will be able to have fun with:

- Annual championships (BeFootball WorldCups) with prizes and very important sponsors.
- Elite players, teams and official stadiums from different countries.
- The most important stadiums recreated with the highest fidelity, and the chance to visit them.
- Game modes with a special dynamic difficulty system that adapts to your progress.
- Worldwide leaderboards and rankings..
- DLCs with the best quality content to expand competitions, teams, stadiums, museums...
- An included Demo area of our BeFootball Move world: move through musicalized exercise trainings endorsed by professional trainers.

BeFootball SuperPlayer, the first immersive soccer metaverse at your fingertips.
